title: Rixos Hotels welcome new regional director of sales and marketing
text:
UAE's Etihad Airways signs USD700m IT deal with US IBM Dubai , UAE, 15 October 2015: The international luxury brand name Hotels, Rixos, has recently announced the appointment of Ms. Yeliz Hisman as the Regional Director of Sales and Marketing. 
Ms. Hisman will be responsible for sales and business development to Rixos hotels across three main continents. The role includes identifying market trends, determining system improvements and implementing change. 
Yeliz Hisman will oversee the implementation of new initiatives to enhance the account portfolio for the hotel, food and beverage outlets, meetings & events and Spa by bringing in new business, increasing profitability and achieving a better positioning of the hotel in key markets around the world. 
Hisman brings over 15 years of hospitality experience in starting from the famous C?ra?an Palace Kempinski, Istanbul, Turkey, moving to Kempinski Hotel Mall of the Emirates, Dubai, then she moved to Bahrain on a Task force assignment at the Kempinski Grand & Ixir Hotel, similarly afterwards she moved back to Dubai Kempinski Hotel & Residences Palm Jumeirah. "I'm honored to part within a great management team in the prestigious Rixos Hotels, one of the fastest growing hotel chains in the world. I Will work with Sales& Marketing team to drive sales and raise awareness of the brand," said Ms. Hisman about her appointment.
She will be seeking "enhanced and managed the sales and business development activities in the UAE and developed key customer/clients relationships with target audiences and Maximized sales pull-through opportunities that are aligned with Rixos hotels group managed care strategy to achieve or exceed targeted revenue goals. About Rixos Hotels Rixos Hotels was established by Mr. Fettah Tamince in 2000 in Antalya, the capital of Turkey's tourism industry. The concept of "All Inclusive - All Exclusive" was developed at Rixos Hotels and represents our brand image.
The Rixos Group has experienced substantial growth over recent years as a direct result of dynamic, flexible and proactive strategic management. Rixos seek to provide uniquely authentic services and experiences; engaging guests of all ages to create memorable journeys in our hotels & resorts. 
Rixos vision is to be best-in-class international operators: a first choice for all stakeholders in our resorts, as well as city hotels that leverage our brand. And to provide unique experiences to guests of all ages that exceed traditional hospitality expectations and go beyond imagination. 
Find out more about Rixos at www.rixos.com/
